title: Ethiopia: In Addis Ababa, It's Crunch Time for the Future of International Development
text:
Kenya: Six Dead, 28 Admitted for Brew Addiction 
The conference is the pinnacle of months of work by 200 government representatives in New York, who have been trying to put together a new global financial framework that will better serve the world's poorest (in theory, at least). 
Over the last few weeks, swarms of labourers outside the United Nations Economic Commission for Africa building have been ripping up and replacing cracked tarmac,... Ethiopia
